name: GALAXIA AR
description:
Let's play arcade game in augmented reality!

Locate an area (floor or wall) to place the all-screen AR arcade machine, then tap to play!
(Note: Tap with two fingers for transparent background!)

• Tap the side of the screen to control spaceship and fire!
• Continue to drag to move the spaceship.
• Swipe up and down to reposition the arcade machine.

Note: if you want to reset arcade machine position, please tap on the reset icon on top left.
